content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "ITE College East" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(June 2021)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*Singapore vocational school **ITE College East** (**ITECE**) is a post-secondary education institution and [statutory board](/wiki/Statutory_boards_of_the_Singapore_Government) under the purview of the [Ministry of Education](/wiki/Ministry_of_Education_(Singapore)) in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). It is one of the [Institute of Technical Education](/wiki/Institute_of_Technical_Education)'s three colleges under the "One ITE System, Three Colleges" Governance and Education Model. ## Academic schools and courses ITE College East has four Schools - Business & Services, Electronics & Info-comm Technology, Engineering and the School of Health Sciences. - [Institute of Technical Education](/wiki/Institute_of_Technical_Education) - [ITE College Central](/wiki/ITE_College_Central) - [ITE College West](/wiki/ITE_College_West) - Official website
title: ITE College East
